titleStmt.title: Historia de donne famose. Or The Romaine iubile which happened in the yeare 855. Disputed lately, that there vvas a woman pope named Ione the eight, against all the Iesuites, by a Germaine, but especially against Rob. Bellarmine father of all controuersies, his treatise De Romano pontifico. lib. 3. cap. 24. Newly translated into English
titleStmt.author: German.
T. B., fl. 1599.
Witekind, Hermann, d. 1603, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Edward Allde] for Edward VVhite, and are to be solde at his shop, neere the little north doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end by author? translator?: T.B.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-E⁴ F² .
Running title reads: The true history of Pope Ione.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, neere the little north doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Gun
